Klasse Allocator_Vma_Impl

java.lang.Object
Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.Impls.Allocator_Vma_Impl
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
AutoCloseable, Allocator, VulkanFreeable
public class Allocator_Vma_Impl extends Object implements Allocator
Allocator Implementation using Vulkan-Memory-Allocator.

      Parameter:

      apiVersion - the api-Version of vulkan
      flags - any flags
